title: Junior Full Stack Developer, Python + React (m/f/d)
description:
Who is Preisenergie?




Preisenergie develops pricing software for energy vendors. We help our customers calculate fair prices for a fully renewable and digital energy system. We model energy prices, simulate millions of alternative prices and choose optimal ones that best fit the goals of our customers (not always profit!). Our prices recover costs of individual consumers' energy consumptions and keep margins low enough to be competitive.




We are a team of 10, with 3 CDTM and 1 M&M and like to celebrate with cake rather than with champagne.




What does the tech stack look like?




On the backend side we have Django REST APIs and pandas. Our database of choice is PostgreSQL. In the frontend we are using Typescript and React.




What will I be working on?




You will have the chance to work on a multitude of greenfield projects.They range from creating new applications that will help energy providers make pricing decisions for contract renewals to designing a new UI for our flagship new customer pricing application.




About You




We don’t want you to be a rock star, a ninja, or a superhero, but to have solid experience with web technologies and software architecture in a professional context and with working and communicating with teams. We are looking for someone who makes well-founded, pragmatic decisions about what competencies to develop and what technologies to use.




 * Bachelor’s degree in computer science, IT, or equivalent experience
 * Working knowledge of Django REST framework
 * Working knowledge of Typescript and React
 * Knowledge of any of the major cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.) is a plus
 * Understanding of Docker and containerization technologies is a plus
   




Why should I join your team?




 * Make energy consumption more sustainable
 * Nerd out over optimization algorithms, bayesian statistics & co.
 * Get your hands dirty on BIG data (energy consumptions, market prices)
 * Enjoy fair compensation: 50-70k salary (depending on experience), 1.5k training budget
 * Build a company together with an experienced team (MIT, HEC, CDTM, M&M, Simon-Kucher) and a proven business model

title: (Junior) Developer Java (all genders)
description:
Bei Exxeta fordern wir das traditionelle Konzept von Beratung und Tech heraus. Über 1200 Kolleg:innen an verschiedenen Standorten schaffen jeden Tag gemeinsam digitale Lösungen, verändern Märkte und Mindsets – angetrieben von unserer Leidenschaft für Technologie, unserem Teamspirit und dem Drang, echten Impact zu schaffen. Hightech with a heartbeat eben.




Du lebst Code. Egal in welcher Rolle – du überzeugst mit deiner Leidenschaft für neue Technologien. Schaffe mit uns State of the Art Lösungen für Kund:innen, Kolleg:innen und in vielseitigen Softwareprojekten.




Was erwartet dich




 * Themenvielfalt meinen wir ernst: Egal ob Frontend/ Backend Development, UI/UX Design, Prototyping, Mobile Development (iOS, Android) oder bei der Integration von Systemen, Diensten, Cloud Lösungen bzw. dem Thema Internet of Things (IoT) – was wird dein nächstes Spezialgebiet?
 * Du erstellst und bearbeitest Entwurfsmuster, Code Reviews, Unittests und Dokumentationen.
 * Agilität ist für dich kein Fremdwort: Du konzipierst und implementierst anspruchsvolle Softwarelösungen mittels agiler Vorgehensweisen im Team.
 * Vertiefe dein Wissen oder erschließe neue innovative Technologien – zeig uns, wofür du brennst.
 * Beweise dein Talent in innovativen Projekten und der Zusammenarbeit mit Kund:innen und Kolleg:innen.
 * Entwicklungsprozesse verändern sich konstant. Hast du Lust sie zusammen im Team zu optimieren?




Was erwarten wir von dir




 * Persönlicher Background: Du bringst ein Studium der (Wirtschafts-)Informatik, Ingenieur- oder Naturwissenschaften oder eine vergleichbare (Informatik-)Ausbildung mit.
 * Zeig uns deine Leidenschaft: Du brennst für hochwertige Softwareentwicklung und hast einen hohen qualitativen Anspruch an diese.
 * Freude am Experimentieren: Deine Neugier und Begeisterung für aktuelle Trends und Themen ermöglichen es dir, Kolleg:innen und Kund:innen von deinen Ideen zu überzeugen.
 * Verantwortung zeigen: Du freust dich darauf später auch im Team selbst Verantwortung zu übernehmen.
 * Fachkenntnisse: Du hast bereits erste praktische Erfahrungen mit Java und den entsprechenden Entwicklertools gesammelt.
 * Let's talk: Du sprichst fließend Deutsch und Englisch - super, dann findest du dich bei Exxeta bestens zurecht.




Warum Exxeta




 * Echte Challenges für dein Wachstum – Weiterbildungsbudget inklusive
 * Für deinen perfekten Start setzen wir auf unser Mentor:innenprogramm
 * Mobiles Arbeiten? Nachteule oder früher Vogel? Für deine optimale Work-Life-Balance gibt es genug Gestaltungsraum.
 * Bleib gesund - neben betrieblicher Krankenversicherung gibt es ein Gesundheitsbudget für individuelle Leistungen
 * Mit dem XX-Bike ins Büro: Wir bezuschussen Fahrrad- und E-Bike-Leasing. Wer legt die meisten Kilometer zurück?




Wir sind ein Zuhause für Tech-Lover:innen und Macher:innen. Herkunft, Alter, Vorlieben – spielt bei uns keine Rolle.




Du glaubst nicht alle Punkte zu 100% zu erfüllen? Studien zeigen, dass sich Angehörige historisch unterrepräsentierter Gruppen in der Regel nur dann auf Stellen bewerben, wenn sie meinen, 100% aller Anforderungen zu erfüllen. Wir möchten ein diverses Team sein, schätzen eine Vielfalt an Perspektiven. Deshalb ermutigen wir dich, dich auch dann zu bewerben, wenn du glaubst, nicht alle Anforderungen zu erfüllen.




Wir möchten dich kennenlernen und erfahren, was du mitbringst.




 * Jonas Schlagenhaft
 * Junior Recruiting Expert
 * +49 173 2448162

title: JUNIOR FULLSTACK DEVELOPER (m/w/d)
description:
english version below




Du liebst das Zocken, bist kreativ und auf der Suche nach einer neuen Herausforderung? Perfekt!




Die MegaDev GmbH wurde 2015 in München gegründet und ist mit ihrer Software PLITCH europäischer Marktführer für legale Cheats und Trainingcodes für Einzelspieler PC-Spiele. PLITCH hilft Spielern, das Spielerlebnis ihrem Geschmack und Vorlieben anzupassen, um die Zeit beim PC-Spielen optimal zu nutzen. Die All-in-One Software kann tausende von Fähigkeiten, Gegenständen und Ressourcen freischalten und repetitives Spielen damit minimieren; andererseits bietet sie aber auch einen Training-Modus, mit dem gezielt Spielsituationen herausfordernder gestaltet werden können.




Unser Team besteht aus erfahrenen Unternehmern, Entwicklern und Enthusiasten aus der Gaming Branche. Dabei fehlst noch Du:




zur Verstärkung suchen wir Dich als einen JUNIOR FULLSTACK DEVELOPER (m/w/d) in Vollzeit.




________________________________________________________________________




Do you love gaming, are you creative and looking for a new challenge? Perfect!




The MegaDev GmbH was founded in Munich, Germany, in 2015 and is the European market leader for legal cheats and training codes for single-player PC games with its software PLITCH. PLITCH gives gamers the freedom to customize their gaming experience according to their wishes. This enables users to get the most out of their play time as our software provides the power to tailor single-player PC games to the players’ exact needs and preferences. On the one hand, the all-in-one product makes it possible to effortlessly increase skills, multiply items, and add resources – thereby minimizing repetitive gameplay. On the other hand, our software offers hardcore cheats which can be utilized for the creation of a training environment in-game. In this way, players can practice and improve their personal gaming skills.




The MegaDev team consists of experienced entrepreneurs, developers and enthusiasts from the gaming industry. But you are still missing:




We are looking for you to support us as a full-time JUNIOR FULLSTACK DEVELOPER (m/f/d).




Aufgaben




TYPISCHE HERAUSFORDERUNGEN DEINER STELLE:




 * Du unterstützt bei der Weiterentwicklung einer skalierbaren und wartbaren Softwarearchitektur
 * Du hilfst beim Design und bei der Analyse von Softwareanforderungen für unseren gesamten Produkt Stack mit
 * Du arbeitest bei der Erstellung neuer und der Verbesserung bestehender Features der Website, des Desktop-Clients und der Mobile-Apps mit
 * Du unterstützt bei der Implementierung neuer Technologien und Techniken und schreibst sauberen, gut dokumentierten Code
 * Du bist Teil des gesamten Design- und Entwicklungsprozesses unseres Produkts PLITCH und übernimmst dabei bereits kleinere Frontend-Projekte, in denen Du neue Designs umsetzt
 * Du lässt im Rahmen der agilen Projektplanung Deine Ideen sowie Erfahrungen ins Team mit einfließen und bringst damit die gemeinsame Weiterentwicklung voran




________________________________________________________________________




TYPICAL CHALLENGE OF YOUR POSITION:




 * You support the further development of a scalable and maintainable software architecture
 * You will help design and analyze software requirements for our entire product stack
 * You will assist with creating new and improving existing features of the website, desktop client, and mobile apps
 * You will support implementing new technologies and techniques and writing clean, well-documented code
 * You will be part of the entire design and development process of our product PLITCH, already taking on smaller front-end projects implementing new designs
 * You will contribute your ideas and experience to the team as part of the agile project planning and thus driving the joint development forward




Qualifikation




DEIN PROFIL:




 * Unser Produkt PLITCH wird auf mehreren Plattformen angeboten, deshalb solltest Du über Kenntnisse in mindestens einem der folgenden Bereiche und der dort verwendeten Frameworks und Technologien verfügen:
 * Web: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery
 * Desktop-Client: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Electron, Node.JS
 * Backend: C#, ASP.Net, .NET 6, SQL Server
 * Android / iOS: C#, Xamarin / .NET MAUI
 * Das Versionierungstool Git ist für Dich keine Unbekannte
 * Ob Servus oder Hello - Du sprichst Deutsch und Englisch fließend




HIT THE HIGHSCORE:




 * Du bist leidenschaftlicher Gamer und kennst Dich mit dem Look-and-Feel von Gaming-Produkten aus
 * Du bist über die aktuellsten Trends und Technologien im IT-Umfeld informiert
 * Du hast einen Blick für eine gute UI und UX
 * Du hast Erfahrung im Umgang mit der Azure-Cloud und Azure DevOps




________________________________________________________________________




YOUR PROFILE:




 * Our product PLITCH is offered on multiple platforms, so you should have knowledge in at least one of the following areas and the frameworks and technologies used there:




o Web: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery




o Desktop client: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Electron, Node.JS




o Backend: C#, ASP.Net, .NET 6, SQL Server




o Android / iOS: C#, Xamarin / .NET MAUI




 * You are familiar with the versioning tool Git
 * Whether Servus or Hello - you speak German and English fluently




HIT THE HIGHSCORE:




 * You are a passionate gamer and are familiar with the look and feel of gaming products
 * You are informed about the latest trends and technologies in the IT environment
 * You have an eye for good UI and UX
 * You are experienced in working with the Azure Cloud and Azure DevOps




________________________________________________________________________




WARUM WIR?




Unser Arbeitsumfeld zeichnet sich durch flache Hierarchiestrukturen aus, die Dir viel Freiheit in Deinen Arbeitsbereichen geben und die Möglichkeit schnell Verantwortung zu übernehmen. Wir sind immer auf der Suche nach der genialsten Lösung und ermuntern jeden unserer Mitarbeiter, täglich neue Wege für Problemlösungen zu finden. Wir sind ein diverses, flexibles und hochmotiviertes Team, schätzen Ehrlichkeit, Transparenz und den respektvollen Umgang miteinander – und sind allesamt Gamer und lieben und leben diese Leidenschaft auch in unserem Alltag!




Um dir etwas zurückzugeben, bieten wir Dir nicht nur ein wettbewerbsfähiges Gehalt, sondern kümmern uns auch sonst um Dich:




 * Zusätzlich zu einem genüsslichen Latte Macchiato, gibt’s auch kalte Softdrinks und Bier bei uns in der Küche – natürlich auf’s Haus
 * Damit Du immer mitreden kannst, bieten wir Dir den Raum und die Unterstützung für Weiterbildungen auf persönlicher und beruflicher Ebene
 * Dank unserer höhenverstellbaren Tische und ergonomischen Stühle gehören Rückenprobleme der Vergangenheit an
 * Für Deine Work-Life-Balance: Zeiterfassung, Gleitzeit, die Möglichkeit zur mobilen Arbeit und 28 bezahlte Urlaubstage
 * Weil wir alle nicht jünger werden, kümmern wir uns um Deine Zukunft und bezuschussen Deine Beiträge zur betrieblichen Altersvorsorge
 * Last but not least: Erholung und gemeinsames Barbecue auf unserer Dachterrasse




Also, worauf wartest Du noch?




Wir können es kaum erwarten, Dich kennenzulernen!




________________________________________________________________________




WHY US?




Our work environment is characterized by flat hierarchy structures, which give you a lot of freedom in your work areas and the opportunity to quickly take on responsibility. We are always looking for the most brilliant solution and encourage each of our employees to find new ways to solve problems every single day.




We are a diverse, flexible, and highly motivated team, we value honesty, transparency, and respectful interaction with each other - and we are all gamers and love and live this passion in our everyday lives!




To give you something back, we don't only offer you a competitive salary but also take care of you in any other way:




 * A creamy Latte Macchiato, some cold soft drinks or a nice, cool beer? Whatever your heart desires, we've got it stocked in our kitchen. On the house, of course
 * Make sure you're always part of the conversation: We offer the opportunities and support for further education on both a professional and a personal level
 * Back problems are a thing of the past with our height-adjustable desks and ergonomic chairs
 * Keep your work and your life in balance with fair time-tracking, flexible working hours, the possibility of mobile work and 28 days of paid vacation
 * We know we're all not getting any younger - that's why we subsidize your contributions to the company pension scheme
 * Last but not least: Our roof terrace is THE spot for some relaxation or a spontaneous barbecue!




So, what are you waiting for?




We can't wait to get in touch with you!

title: Full-Stack Engineer
description:
We are Isarsoft




We make every camera count




At Isarsoft we develop video analytics software to make transportation and cities more efficient, inclusive and secure. We stand for data protection and responsible processing of sensitive data. Being on the forefront of innovation we work together in interdisciplinary teams in a positive, fun and energetic atmosphere.




Our customers and partners are at the center of everything we do. Founded in 2019 we have grown organically winning large customers and partners delivering compelling, reliable, high-performance software. We are proud of being a privately held company with family atmosphere focusing on long-term relations to our customers and team members.




Your mission




As Full-Stack Engineer at Isarsoft you will be at the heart of the product development. You will be closely working together with our international product team including Isarsoft's CTO and Co-Founder. It is within your responsibilities to develop and maintain the backend logic, APIs and user interface of Isarsoft Perception.




Your profile




 * Sound experience in TypeScript, NodeJs, ORM, Databases and React
 * Deep understanding of Component Architectures and well-defined Interfaces
 * Experience in working with GraphQL APIs
 * Knowledge of frontend and backend testing in Typescript
 * Fluent in English, German is a plus
 * Teamplayer. You are passionate about working with talented and inspiring people
   




Additional Assets




 * An understanding for user friendly design (UI / UX)
 * Familiarity with Docker / Linux
   




Benefits




 * An experienced, highly motivated and international team to learn and grow
 * A high-impact work environment with flat hierarchies and short decision-making processes
 * Have the flexibility to work from anywhere: A great office in Garching nearby Munich, from home or the English-Garden
 * Free lunch, coffee and drinks at our office
   




Sounds good? We are just getting started. Let's build a great company together.




Hiring Process




We are committed to a transparent and fair hiring process. We aim for concluding the interview process in no longer than 3 weeks.




The following three stages are typical for any position at Isarsoft.




 * Video Interview with HR
 * Technical Deep Dive / Challenge
 * A personal meeting with the founders
   
   

We deeply believe that a great product only can be build by a great team. That's why sharing our values, being a team-player and having a energetic attitude is as important as bringing the right technical skills.




About Us




Learn more about Isarsoft




www.isarsoft.com




Follow us on social media




LinkedIn | YouTube | Twitter




Fun fact: Isar is the river flowing through the heart of Munich contributing to making it one of the most liveable cities in the world. Isarsoft Perception provides people-, and traffic flow analytics to enhance mobility, safety and live in cities across the globe.




Let's make every camera count!

title: Full Stack Developer (m/f/d)
description:
Responsibilities




We are seeking a highly motivated Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic and growing team. As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining web + mobile applications. You will work with a team of talented developers, designers, and product managers to create innovative software solutions that meet our clients' needs.




 * Develop and maintain web + mobile applications and services using modern web technologies
 * Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
 * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and test new features and functionality
 * Participate in code reviews and contribute to the development of best practices and coding standards
 * Debug and troubleshoot issues in production and non-production environments
 * Keep up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in web development
   




Requirements




 * Professional working experience in full-stack web/mobile app development
 * Proficiency in front-end development technologies around JavaScript, and related frameworks such as React, Vue, React Native and/or Flutter
 * Proficiency in back-end development technologies such as Node.js, Express or similar frameworks
 * Experience with relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB)
 * Experience with source control management tools (e.g., Git)
 * Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
 * Excellent communication in English and interpersonal skills
 * Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team
   
   

Nice to have:




 * Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Azure
 * Familiarity with containerization and orchestration technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes
 * Experience with agile development methodologies
   




Benefits




 * Competitive salary
 * Flexible work schedule and remote work options
 * +2 days extra off (Christmas and NYE)
 * Travel budget to explore Munich and/or Barcelona
 * Company-sponsored social events, (e.g., team-retreats in Mallorca, Italy) and team-building activities (e.g., yearly Christmas hackathon)
 * Opportunities for growth and advancement within MVST (e.g., €1.500 on top, sponsored Udemy courses)
 * Free language courses
 * Home office budget
 * Sponsored gym membership
 * Digital vouchers for meals and (public) transport tickets
 * Monthly company breakfast and lunch
 * Free coffee, water, fresh fruits and snacks, granola bar for breakfasts
   




About Us




MVST is on a mission to launch products and services for companies that have a meaningful impact on the world. MVST is unique in more ways than one. We are well known for innovative design, progressive ways of working, and cutting-edge technology - and on top of that, we´re completely independent. We also don’t take ourselves too seriously, though - it’s all about enjoying the journey. Being a member of MVST means being passionate about our industry, digital products, and their power to change human behaviors.

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer (m/f/d) -  Java
description:
Your mission




We are looking for a talented and driven Full Stack Software Engineer to join our Customer Platform team. Certivity is a tech startup that digitizes the way how product makers manage regulatory requirements to be compliant. As a Full Stack Software Engineer, you will be working with the latest innovative technologies to develop and maintain our cloud SaaS (Software as a Service) application.




Your profile




If you love coding and taking ownership of features on both front- and back-end side, you appreciate code reviews and the result of clean code conventions, and you are a learner who wants to constantly improve, Certivity is looking for you.




Your profile:




 * You have a tech or computer science degree is preferred, but not necessary if you know how to code
 * Strong proficiency in front-end technologies such as React, Angular, or Vue
 * Solid experience in back-end technologies such as Java or Node.js
 * Experience with relational and/or NoSQL databases
 * Strong understanding of software development principles, design patterns, and best practices
 * Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
 * Effective communication and collaboration skills
 * Ability to work in a fast-paced, agile environment
 * Fluent spoken and written English (company language is English)
   




Why us?




Founded in 2021, Certivity is a young startup in the field of RegTech (Regulatory Technology). Everyone in our team loves solving complex problems and is passionate about building software. You have the chance to work with industry experts in both software as well as regulatory domain to be onboarded with a super-fast learning curve.




Apart from that we offer:

 * Fair compensation, flexible working schedules, free choice of when and where you want to work
 * Stock options to share in our company's success
 * A mission-driven startup culture in a comfortable environment: we value leisure time, family, and friends & open communication
 * A team that is very welcoming to new members, we are embracing each other and learn from our mutual experiences, celebrate together, and have fun at work.
 * Pick any laptop and we get it for you (MacBook Pro? Razor Blade? No problem!)
 * Startup feeling in the Werksviertel in Munich@Werk1 or in Stuttgart@Steyg startup hubs with regular startup events
 * Free drinks (water, tea, coffee, beer) and snacks in our offices
 * Regular team events (eating out, karaoke)
 * Young team, young software: your creativity and ideas make a difference right from the start!
 * Modern tech stack
    * Front-end: React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS
    * Back-end: Java on Spring Boot + MongoDB
      
      




Closing




We welcome candidates from all backgrounds and encourage diversity in our team. We encourage female engineers to apply and join our mission-driven culture that values open communication, work-life balance, and a welcoming environment. Convince us with your personality and your skills - and together we will make great things happen!




About Us




Founded in 2021, we at Certivity are a young, creative, and dynamic team of highly skilled domain experts working on innovative RegTech Software. Our solution will shape and define the term “RegTech” as we develop a completely new product for the highly complex and not yet digitized environment of product regulations. Our primary focus is the automotive industry, with options to expand to many other domains as well. Our B2B cloud platform bundles all relevant tasks for compliance with vehicle regulations and laws. For more information about us and our product have a look at our website.

title: Junior Software Developer:in (m/w/d)
description:
Für unserer Projekte benötigen wir gute Deutschkenntnisse, bitte lade daher auch deine Unterlagen in Deutsch auf die Plattform hoch.




Was erwartet dich?




 * Du unterstützt unser Team in spannenden Customer Experience-Projekten bei führenden Energieversorgern in der DACH-Region.
 * Dein Fokus liegt auf der Softwareprogrammierung, dabei analysierst du betriebswirtschaftliche Prozesse und entwickelst neue anspruchsvolle Lösungen auf Basis von SAP Komponenten, AWS und Microsoft Azure.
 * Du wirst in den kompletten Projektzyklus in enger Zusammenarbeit mit unseren Kunden eingebunden - von der Anforderungsaufnahme und -analyse über die Programmierung bis hin zum laufenden Produkt.
 * Du konzipierst und integrierst neue Funktionen.
 * Du entwickelst innovative Technologien.




Was solltest du mitbringen?




 * Du verfügst über ein erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Hochschulstudium mit Bezug zur (Wirtschafts-) Informatik, Mathematik, Physik, BWL oder vergleichbar.
 * Du hast bereits Grundkenntnisse in mindestens einer (objektorientierten) Programmiersprache gesammelt.
 * Idealerweise besitzt du erste Berufserfahrung im IT-Umfeld (auch im Rahmen von Praktika oder Werkstudententätigkeiten).
 * Du bist ein Teamplayer und teilst gerne deine Ideen.
 * Sehr gute Kommunikationsfähigkeiten in deutscher Sprache sowie die Bereitschaft, national zu reisen, runden dein Profil ab.




Was bieten wir dir?




 * Wir bieten dir ein attraktives Gesamtpaket (Gehalt, Hardware nach Wahl, Sportförderung, exklusive Mitarbeiterrabatte)
 * Regelmäßige und systematische (interne und externe) Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten
 * Moderne Arbeitsweisen und flexibles, mobiles Arbeiten in einem internationalen Team mit großem Zusammenhalt
 * Wir leben das Networking und bieten unzählige Team-Events.
 * Mentoring mit jemandem aus deinem künftigen Bereich für mindestens sechs Monate
 * Möglichkeit bzgl. Homeoffice nach der Einarbeitung und attraktive Offices in Karlsruhe + München.




Unser Jobangebot Junior Software Developer:in (m/w/d) klingt vielversprechend? Dann freuen wir uns auf eine Bewerbung über Workwise.




Bei unserem Partner Workwise kann man sich in nur wenigen Minuten ohne Anschreiben für diesen Job bewerben und den Status der Bewerbung live verfolgen.

title: Full Stack Developer (f/m/d)
description:
At ADH, our mission is to radically innovate the way we think about health insurance worldwide. We offer digital health services based on advanced data analytics and a modern IT architecture. In everything we do, we strive to redefine existing methodologies and pioneer completely new experiences. Being an internal startup of Allianz SE, founded in 2019, we constantly aim high, and we deliver.




If you feel inspired by the idea to revolutionize not just the health insurance business but prospectively the health care system, then ADH is the right place for you.




As a Full Stack Developer (f/m/d) you will strengthen our agile cross-functional team with your experience in IT projects, cloud architecture and development in a modern state-of-the-art tech stack (Angular, Kotlin, Spring). You will be part of an agile team responsible for the development of digital health services. As an experienced developer you will use your knowledge to provide leading edge, high quality deliverables for multiple companies and countries.




Join us, if you enjoy a startup atmosphere whilst having the reach and market access of one of the largest insurance companies worldwide.




Tasks




 * You will work in cross-functional scrum teams to develop healthcare and health insurance related services
 * Identify requirements and develop a product vision for health insurance services
 * Align with multiple development teams working for multiple countries
 * Implement cloud native microservices with a modern technology stack
 * Improve quality and strive for continuous innovation with regards to products and technology stack




Our current tech stack




Angular | Spring Boot 2 | Jenkins | Docker | Kubernetes | Helm | Prometheus/Grafana | SQL/noSQL Database | Keycloak




Requirements




 * You have advanced development skills and proven work experience (at least 3 years+) in Angular, Java/Kotlin, Spring, SQL
 * Experience in development of microservices (e.g. using Spring Boot) using CI/CD and automated testing approaches
 * MA in Computer Science, Systems Engineering or similar relevant field is a plus
 * You are highly familiar with agile IT project methodologies (Scrum, Devops) preferably in an international context
 * You are also familiar with event-driven architecture concepts (streaming platforms, event driven design, Kafka)
 * Advanced English skills, German is a plus




Benefits




 * Working in a true startup culture, with great flexibility in working style, freedom to shape your working environment and lots of room to have real impact beyond your direct area of responsibility
 * Ultra-flat hierarchy and fast decision-making processes
 * Balance your work and your other commitments with flexible working hours and the chance to regularly work from home
 * Build friendships with your colleagues while enjoying the best coffee in Munich in our artsy office in Munich-Riem (Messestadt-West) and enjoy your break on the rooftop garden
 * Celebrate successes with personal appreciation and feedback culture
 * You enjoy Allianz Group benefits (e.g. Employee Share Purchase Plan, Company Pension, the advantage of the WELLPASS offering, cross border remote working within EU countries and much more)




Additional information:




The Office is located in Munich-Riem (Willy-Brandt-Platz 3; Messestadt West U2).




Are you interested?




We are looking forward to your application via JOIN.




If you have any questions, you are very welcome to contact us via email.




Please be informed that unfortunately applications sent via email can't be considered.

title: Software Developer
description:
We‘re a young Munich-based company, focused on sports, health and medical products and looking to grow our software development team.




Especially we are looking for a passionate software developer who is interested in the overall architecture and bringing state-of-the-art/ new software development-technologies continuously into consideration.




This is your chance to not only join our experienced team of entrepreneurs and engineers right at the beginning of a new project but also to be one of the stakeholders and work on game-changing products.




Help us build and revolutionize the standard of scientific software with our app for iOS, Android and the Web,




Tasks




You will join our team of software developers and focus on building our Apps. All with the same codebase thanks to Flutter and utilizing the strong advantages.




Requirements




Must have:




 * Experience working in an agile Sprint/Scrum environment.
 * Working with git in a CI/CD Project.
 * At least 6 months experience in a commercial flutter project.
 * Must be located in Europe
 * Must be German / native speaker (no other possibility)
 * Must speak English fluent
 * Must have a great passion and interest in state of the art software development technologis




Nice to have:




 * Experience with Bloc and Provider.
 * Experience with Unit and Widget Tests
 * Experience with Kotlin and Android Development
 * Experience with rust, c++, AWS, databases, etc.




Benefits




You will benefit from the safety and stability of an established company while having the freedom and benefits of starting of something new! Now only will you have the chance to write state-of-the-art software, but also to learn more about entrepreneurship by our experienced founders.




Please be aware that we can not hire freelancers for this position.




Your ideal profile:




Enthusiastic and focused Software Engineer dedicated to developing mobile applications of exceptional quality and further improving development and design skills. Highly versed in the utilization of Flutter. Capable of implementing large-scale state management and domain logic in a clean, decoupled manner. Thorough understanding of the Flutter SDK from high-level concepts like Widgets and Navigation to lower-level concepts like hit testing, layout, and painting. Proficient in algorithms and data structures as well as implementing contemporary design patterns. Experienced in writing clean, well-documented, extendible code. Well-organized and collaborative team player with strong communication and analytical abilities.

title: (Junior) Developer (all genders)
description:
Bei Exxeta fordern wir das traditionelle Konzept von Beratung und Tech heraus. Über 1200 Kolleg:innen an verschiedenen Standorten schaffen jeden Tag gemeinsam digitale Lösungen, verändern Märkte und Mindsets – angetrieben von unserer Leidenschaft für Technologie, unserem Teamspirit und dem Drang, echten Impact zu schaffen. Hightech with a heartbeat eben.




Du lebst Code. Egal welcher technischer Schwerpunkt – du überzeugst mit Leidenschaft für neue Technologien. Schaffe mit uns state-of-the-art Lösungen für Kund:innen, Kolleg:innen und in Projekten.




Was erwartet dich




 * Vertiefe Wissen oder erschließe neue innovative Technologien – zeig uns, wofür du brennst.
 * Themenvielfalt meinen wir ernst: Egal ob, Prototyping, Frontend/ Backend / Fullstack Development, Mobile Development (iOS, Android), Integration von Systemen, UI/UX Design oder Cloud Lösungen – was wird dein nächstes Spezialgebiet?
 * Beweise dein Talent in innovativen Projekten und der Zusammenarbeit mit Kund:innen und Kolleg:innen.
 * Entwicklungsprozesse verändern sich konstant. Lust sie zusammen zu optimieren?




Was erwarten wir von dir




 * Persönlicher Background: Du hast idealerweise ein abgeschlossenes Studium der (Wirtschafts-)Informatik oder einen Abschluss in einem vergleichbaren Studiengang.
 * Tech Skills: Du beschäftigst dich gerne mit Programmiersprachen und Technologien und hast idealerweise schon erste praktische Erfahrung.
 * Kreative Problemlösung: Du fuchst dich gerne in unterschiedliche Problemstellungen ein und erarbeitest im Team kreative Lösungen.
 * Teamwork: Teamarbeit liegt dir im Blut, und du hast Spaß dabei, dein Wissen und deine Ideen mit anderen zu teilen.
 * Wissenshunger: Du hast großes Interesse dich weiterzuentwickeln, zu experimentieren und auch mal um die Ecke zu denken.
 * Let's talk: Du sprichst fließend Deutsch und Englisch - super, dann findest du dich bei Exxeta bestens zurecht.




Warum Exxeta




 * Echte Challenges für dein Wachstum – Weiterbildungsbudget inklusive
 * Für deinen perfekten Start setzen wir auf unser Mentor:innenprogramm
 * Mobiles Arbeiten? Nachteule oder früher Vogel? Für deine optimale Work-Life-Balance gibt es genug Gestaltungsraum.
 * Bleib gesund - neben betrieblicher Krankenversicherung gibt es ein Gesundheitsbudget für individuelle Leistungen
 * Mit dem XX-Bike ins Büro: Wir bezuschussen Fahrrad- und E-Bike-Leasing. Wer legt die meisten Kilometer zurück?




Wir sind ein Zuhause für Tech-Lover:innen und Macher:innen. Herkunft, Alter, Vorlieben – spielt bei uns keine Rolle.




Du glaubst nicht alle Punkte zu 100% zu erfüllen? Studien zeigen, dass sich Angehörige historisch unterrepräsentierter Gruppen in der Regel nur dann auf Stellen bewerben, wenn sie meinen, 100% aller Anforderungen zu erfüllen. Wir möchten ein diverses Team sein, schätzen eine Vielfalt an Perspektiven. Deshalb ermutigen wir dich, dich auch dann zu bewerben, wenn du glaubst, nicht alle Anforderungen zu erfüllen.




Wir freuen uns schon darauf, dich kennenzulernen! Du hast noch Fragen? Dann melde dich gerne.




 * Susanne Schneider
 * Senior Recruiting Expert
 * +49 1523 4680236

title: Software Engineer - Backend (m/f/d)
description:
Your mission




We are looking for creative and driven Backend Developers to join our growing engineering team and accelerate our product development:




 * Together with the rest of the product & engineering team you will develop a B2B SaaS Webapp.
 * As we are in the early stages of our product offering, you will have the opportunity to explore and develop new ideas from prototype to finished product.
 * You will be a core team member from day one, tackling our biggest challenges together with us. As a team we highly value learning from each other, and expect every member to raise the team's bar by bringing new knowledge and ideas to the team. Additionally, we want you to participate in code and design reviews and share your knowledge with other engineers on our team.
 * We firmly believe in " you build it, you run it " - you are responsible for testing, deploying and monitoring your code.
   




Our Tech Stack




As engineers, we always put prime focus on the product and our customers and use the tools which best help us achieve our goals. Below is our ever growing tech stack:




 * react
 * Python/Django
 * PostgreSQL
 * AWS Cloud
 * docker
   
   

Our tech stack is not set in stone and may evolve as requirements shift. We expect a new hire to be comfortable in at least some of our languages and frameworks, and are always happy to incorporate input from team members about tools which may be useful for the team




Your profile




 * You have 4+ yrs of professional experience in at least one of the following: Python, Javascript/Typescript
 * You have a degree in Computer Science or a related field, or equivalent industry
 * You have deep familiarity with modern software development
 * You have considerable experience in developing web applications and have used frameworks such as React, Django, Flask, FastAPI, Express and others.
 * You have a passion for learning and growing with us.
 * You are fluent in English and open to relocate to Munich.
 * You have a genuine interest in and curiosity about sustainability tech.
 * Kind Note : Only apply if you have a valid working permit in Germany (or the EU)
   




Why us?




 * Collaborate and learn - with and from experienced and interdisciplinary colleagues
 * Lots of impact - joining early in the team
 * Growth opportunities - you will have opportunities to stretch yourself and develop new skills while growing a new venture
 * Competitive compensation - we believe in rewarding good work
 * Equity - we want you to own part of the success you help creating
 * Workplace - a modern office in the heart of Munich or your home
 * Fun place to work - great culture & diversity is crucial for us
 * Regular offsite - to spend some quality time together, in person
 * einwert is a PropTech startup that raised a multimillion pre-seed round in spring 2022
 * Language courses
   




About Us




einwert is the first European hybrid appraiser reimagining real estate valuation as a unique value experience. By digital technology that empowers our appraisers and offers unparalleled market transparency, we help real estate investors to make smarter and future-oriented decisions.

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer (Munich-based)
description:
Your mission




At Sizekick, we are an international team creating the best-in-class size recommendation experience for e-commerce to reduce returns.




Join our experienced Engineering team to help shape both our engineering culture and the future of online apparel shopping around the globe. You will have a direct impact on our product, our users, our organization, our engineering practices - and the environment!




The Role:




We are seeking a talented and motivated Full-Time Software Engineer to join our dynamic team with a strong engineering culture. We like to live on the cutting edge and we use the latest technologies to reduce our engineering overhead - this lets us focus on solving problems. As an experienced Software Engineer, you will play a crucial role in the development of new features in collaboration with our product team. You will also be responsible for writing unit and end-to-end tests, testing, deploying to production, and monitoring the performance of our applications. Additionally, you will leverage data analytics and business intelligence to help drive the implementation of innovative features.




Responsibilities:




 * Collaborate closely with the product team to develop new features from end to end.
 * Develop web-based applications using technologies such as JavaScript, HTML and CSS.
 * Write, deploy and maintain cloud functions in python.
 * Write and maintain unit and end-to-end tests to ensure the reliability and quality of our software.
 * Implement asynchronous programming techniques to enhance the responsiveness and efficiency of our applications.
 * Optimize web performance to deliver exceptional user experiences.
 * Apply an expert eye for UX and UI design, ensuring visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.
 * Test and deploy applications to production, ensuring a smooth and efficient deployment process.
 * Monitor the performance of our applications in production, proactively identifying and addressing any performance bottlenecks or issues.
 * Utilize data analytics and business intelligence to contribute to the ideation and implementation of new features.
 * Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback and ensuring code quality.
 * Embrace an autonomous and ownership-driven mindset to make impactful decisions.
 * Cultivate a user-centric approach, considering end-users in every aspect of development.
 * Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies, bringing fresh ideas to the team.
   




Your profile




Qualifications:




 * Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).
 * Min. 3 years of experience in software development, with a strong focus on JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Python.
 * Experience with Typescript, Lit, RxJS, Tailwind, and/or Firebase is a plus
 * Experience writing and maintaining unit and end-to-end tests.
 * Solid understanding of the software development lifecycle and agile methodologies.
 * Proficiency in asynchronous programming techniques.
 * Advanced knowledge of web performance optimization strategies.
 * Keen eye for UX and UI design principles.
 * Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot issues in production environments.
 * Excellent collaboration and communication skills.
 * Familiarity with data analytics and business intelligence tools is a plus.
   




Why us?




Our offer:




 * Competitive salary
 * 30 paid vacation days
 * Employee-friendly VSOP program
 * Generous bonus model
 * Team events
 * Top-notch equipment and modern office in Munich
 * Company bike
 * Coffee, drinks, snack in the office
   




The location of the role will be in Germany with a hybrid working model: You can work with our great team in our nice office in Munich or from home (anywhere in Germany).




About Us




Why did we start Sizekick?




At Sizekick, we are putting an end to unnecessary size-related returns in online fashion retail. We use artificial intelligence and computer vision technology to recommend the right clothing size, and with the help of Sizekick’s integrated software, everyone can find their correct size on our partner shops in just a few seconds with a smartphone. The environment will thank us too, because for each saved return approx. 500 g of CO2 emissions are saved.




Our vision




To provide the world's most-loved, sustainable, and accurate size recommendation experience.

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer (m/f/d)
description:
The Mission




Munich-based OroraTech is developing a constellation of nanosatellites with thermal infrared cameras for automated wildfire detection, infrastructure monitoring and many other applications.




Our all-in-one wildfire service is designed to quickly detect thermal hotspots on a global scale. It provides reliable data fused from multiple satellite sources and wildfire detection algorithms. By providing monitoring and notification services for areas at risk, we help both public and private sector customers to protect forests and biodiversity.




With our upcoming second own satellite mission (FOREST-2 to be launched in summer) we aim to expand our Core Application Team responsible for developing and maintaining the data platform. By joining us you'll have a direct impact on our users who are fighting climate change every day.




What You’ll Be Doing




As a member of the Core Application Team at OroraTech you will:




 * Design, develop and maintain scalable, high-performance, and reliable web applications using Docker, Git, Go, Python, and Vue.js.
 * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
 * Ensure code quality, organization, and automation through continuous integration and deployment practices.
 * Participate in code reviews to maintain code standards and improve software quality.
 * Solve numerous technical challenges, troubleshoot, debug, and optimize application performance and system bottlenecks.
 * Keep up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure our platform remains competitive and cutting-edge.
   




Relevant Skills




We expect that you bring the following:




 * Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent experience.
 * Previous working experience in agile software development team.
 * Experience with HTML5, CSS3, Typescript/Javascript (ES6+), and reactive web frameworks (Vue.js, React, or similar).
 * Experience with SQL and server-side development (Go, Python, Node, or similar).
 * Strong understanding of web architectures, RESTful APIs, and database design.
 * Agile development and version control (git) is your bread & butter.
 * Good communication skills: Fluent English skills, German is a plus.
 * You are eligible to work in Germany.
   




What skills and knowledge will make a difference:




 * Previous experience with geospatial data and spatial databases (PostGIS or similar).
 * Familiarity with microservice architecture and application monitoring technologies.
 * Expertise with CI/CD processes and technologies (Gitlab, Jenkins, or similar).
 * Familiarity with basic DevOps technologies and concepts.
 * Proven experience working on an open-source project.
   




About Us




At OroraTech, you can expect a down-to-earth yet high-caliber work environment. You will be part of the OroraTech team - a talented, international, and open-minded team that is highly motivated to create impact. OroraTech allows you to grow on a professional and personal level.




 * You have the opportunity to become part of our firefighting mission from space and deliver the tools to better cope with natural disasters and mitigate climate change - could a job be any cooler?
 * You will be responsible for your own project(s), time management, and sometimes even budget.
 * You will gain insights into the most exciting new technologies and business models.
 * We value perfect espresso and (oat milk) flat white through our high-grade espresso machine. Additionally, free drinks, beer, and snacks are always available at the office.
 * Access to mobility or sports benefits (Urban Sports Club) after your probation period.
 * Yes, we have a pool and access to the rooftop terrace at the office compound!
 * There is the opportunity to become part of our virtual employee stock option program (VESOP) for all permanent employees.
 * You will always have a great story to tell at parties!
   
   

If you apply: We value well-crafted motivation letters stating how you learned about OroraTech, why you think you would be a great addition to the team and why you want to work at a NewSpace start-up. Please always include references of your prior work (for example, your thesis, talks, papers, code repositories, websites, write-ups, articles, apps, exposes, anything), if permissible. Please avoid detailed grade reports and online certificates. Please also list your earliest starting date and expected salary.

title: Frontend Software Engineer (w/d/m)
description:
About Ory




With more than 30,000 members, Ory is the leading open-source identity management, authentication and authorization ecosystem and community in the world. Ory’s flagship zero trust network “Ory Network” is a global, scalable and secure platform for managing identities and its distribution across various internet services including IoT and emerging Fintech systems. Ory is an IT start-up founded in 2019 that promotes an open, diverse, agile and collaborative working culture.




About This Role




As a frontend developer at Ory, you’ll be responsible for creating the best possible experience for users of the Ory Network. You’ll apply your knowledge of UI/UX principles to create software that other developers enjoy using.




Key Tasks and Deliverables




 * Write code for web-based applications, creating fast, easy-to-use, high-volume traffic applications.
 * Develop, create and improve code in an agile environment within the team.
 * Share your knowledge and experience with colleagues and customers.
 * Optimize web applications to maximize speed, scale, and support for diverse clients and devices.
 * Create readable and maintainable code, and ensure the highest quality by providing E2E test support.
 * Build libraries, frameworks, and documentation empowering developers around the globe.
 * Design and implement simple intuitive user interfaces in partnership with designers.
 * Create frontend experience by interacting with backend systems.
   




Minimum Requirements




 * You studied Computer Science, or a related technical field, or have equivalent practical experience.
 * You’re a web-native developer well-versed in TypeScript or JavaScript
 * You have knowledge of React or similar frameworks like Angular or Vue
 * You´ll take ownership and provide support for other developers
 * You care about the user experience and you know how to put this into practice
 * It is ok for you to work 4 days a week from the office in Munich on average
   




Mindset




 * Will - a desire to excel, act with courage, persevere, learn and innovate
 * Cultural fit - align with Ory’s core values (think big - move fast, passion & excellence, innovation, customer centricity, respect)
 * Results-oriented - deliver on our KPI’s / desired outcomes
   




Why Ory?




 * Be part of an international, fast-growing, equity and open source-based infrastructure provider
 * Take on responsibility and shape things right from the start
 * Work in a flat organisational structure
 * Work with high quality technical equipment
 * Work in a very modern, open space and collaborative office in Munich with very good public transportation connection
 * 30 days of vacation
   




Contact Information




We are looking for people with passion, curiosity, and integrity. You're encouraged to apply even if your experience does not precisely match the job description. Your skills and curiosity will stand out and set you apart.




If you have questions or feedback you can contact us via Mail at hr@ory.sh .

title: Junior Java Software Developer (m/f/d) Girokonto
description:
Different banks - different account types with different conditions and requirements. We find the best!




We are CHECK24 - the leading German comparison platform with more than 15 million customers and over 40 products.




Are you fascinated by agile working, digital business models and a dynamic team? Become a part of our team and help us develop the financial comparison!




We have several releases every day, with the goal to offer our customers the best experience at every moment. Using agile methodologies, we promote full ownership of the systems between our teams. We build our own platform, we run it, and if it breaks we’ll fix it.




You can expect Domain Driven Design and microservice structures, as well as agile methods and processes.




We work with following modern technologies because they are effective, efficient and fun: JAVA LTS (11 and 17), Spring Boot 3 and Spring Framework 5, Maven, React, MongoDB, RabbitMQ - but of course also Junit 5 and Mockito!




So come and join us. We are looking forward to your application as Junior Java Software Developer (m/f/d) at Vergleichsportal Karten & Konten GmbH.




Tasks




 * Development of new features in our overall microservice based architecture
 * Maintenance and further development of our modern web applications and backend services
 * You participate in code reviews and make constructive suggestions
 * Close cooperation with the product management and the executive board
 * Participation in bank integration projects




Requirements




 * You have first experience in Java development, ideally in a professional environment
 * Experience in common build and deploy processes with GIT, Maven, Jenkins as well as Docker
 * Knowledge in database, relational and NoSQL
 * Good English skills, both written and spoken, will make you the “perfect fit”, German is definitely a big plus




Benefits




 * With hundreds of developers, in small agile teams, we are more than a website
 * Modern working: Full-time employees work three days per week together in our office - the other two days flexibly from the office or from home ("remote working"). In addition, you can work flexibly from home or abroad for one week a year.
 * Experience and stability: more than 15 years of successes and failures shared across the group in over 15 locations
 * Working with customer orientation: each division at CHECK24 acts largely independently and unconditionally oriented towards its customers. This means focus and working methods like in a start-up with small teams and without superfluous coordination
 * Environment that demands and promotes openness and willingness to learn: You take responsibility in your team right from the start. If your ideas make our products better, we will adopt them. You know a tool that makes us better as a team? We will implement it together with you
 * We'll help you get ahead: Together with you, your manager is responsible for your personal development in your daily work. For this purpose, we offer trainings especially designed for our employees, such as the deepening of your IT skills
 * We value your commitment: permanent contracts and attractive compensation with annual bonuses for special successes. Vouchers for numerous CHECK24 products, a subsidized company pension plan up to special conditions in fitness studios and a subsidized MVV ticket
 * Food & Drinks: In addition to one free meal per day (breakfast or lunch), we provide you with fresh fruit from the region and you are also free to help yourself to drinks
 * Checkito-Spirit: We know that only excellent teams develop excellent online products. That's why events to celebrate and network as well as our legendary summer and Christmas parties are part of our daily work routine

title: Frontend Software Engineer  (m/f/d)
description:
What You’re Keen To Do




We are seeking a skilled and passionate Frontend Software Engineer to join our team, dedicated to building our AnyFleet web app. As a Frontend Software Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in designing and developing the user interface of our web application using Vue.js. Your focus will be on creating visually appealing, intuitive, and user-friendly experiences, combining your technical expertise with a keen eye for design and UX.




In this role you will be able to:




 * Design and implement responsive and interactive user interfaces using Vue.js and related technologies.
 * Develop reusable and modular components that adhere to design and coding best practices.
 * Design, implement, and test APIs implementations for global deployment in production environments.
 * Collaborate with product managers, designers, and backend engineers to understand requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
 * Implement user-friendly interactions and intuitive workflows to enhance the overall user experience.
 * Conduct thorough testing and debugging of the frontend codebase to ensure high-quality software.
 * Keep up-to-date with industry best practices, technologies, and trends related to backend development and Microservices.
 * Provide support and technical guidance to external development teams to meet project milestones.
   




Essential Qualifications




What we’re looking for




 * Proven experience as a Frontend Software Engineer, working on complex web applications or SPAs.
 * Strong proficiency in Vue.js and related frontend technologies (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript/ES6+).
 * Demonstrated ability to create visually appealing, responsive, and user-friendly web interfaces.
 * Solid understanding of UI/UX principles and best practices, with a strong design sense and attention to detail.

 * Excellent collaboration and communication skills to work effectively within a team and across functional groups.
 * Knowledge of version control systems, such as Git, and proficiency in using Git workflows (e.g., branching, merging, pull requests).
   




Preferred Qualifications




 * Proficiency in working with real-time communication protocols.
 * Experience with best practices for unit/integration/e2e frontend tests frameworks and tools (e.g., Jest, Cypress, Selenium) to ensure code quality and reliability.
 * Knowledge in implementing and working with Service Workers in web applications.
 * Understanding of frontend performance monitoring and debugging tools (e.g., Chrome DevTools, Lighthouse).
   




Hi there, happy to meet you!




 * At idealworks we give your passion the space to grow and develop within a up-and-coming brand in the BMW Group’s corporate portfolio.
 * With us, you will find an multicultural work environment and become part of an experienced, open minded team which puts value on mutual trust and you will feel comfortable with from the get go.
 * Experience the start-up feeling and flat hierarchies while working on varied and impactful tasks, and being responsible for their progress.
 * You can look forward to a flexible work schedule with 30 vacation days per year and various options for a suitable work-life-balance.
 * For your commitment to supporting us in our mission and creating WOW moments for our customers, you will not only be rewarded with appreciation, but also with above-average pay with bonus arrangements.
 * The package is rounded off with exciting corporate benefits and the offer of a company pension plan.
 * Located in the immediate vicinity of the OEZ, our office is easy to reach by public transport, bike and car and offers numerous catering options for a relaxed lunch break.
 * Driven by our unique corporate culture, the five values "passion for results", "wellbeing", "personal growth", "trust" and "being and acting as one team" determine our daily actions and cooperation.
   




About Us




idealworks was founded in 2020 as a wholly owned BMW Group subsidiary. As a deep-tech company, we offer an industry-leading solution portfolio for the autonomization of the modern factory with our robotics ecosystem consisting of our cloud platform AnyFleet and our autonomous mobile robot iw.hub.

title: Full Stack Web Developer (m/w/d)
description:
Die Süddeutsche Zeitung Digitale Medien GmbH, ein Unternehmen der Südwestdeutschen Medienholding (SWMH), sucht zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt einen Full Stack Web Developer (m/w/d)




 * Süddeutsche Zeitung Digitale Medien GmbH
 * München
 * Vollzeit




Wer wir sind




Die Süddeutsche Zeitung Digitale Medien GmbH (SZDM) ist das digitale Kreativzentrum der Süddeutschen Zeitung.




Einfach schneller mehr wissen: Die technische, gestalterische und redaktionelle Produktion aller digitalen Produkte der Süddeutschen Zeitung ist die Hauptaufgabe der SZDM.




Wir entdecken die Welt minütlich neu und überraschen täglich mit vielseitigen Inhalten.




Wir berichten so schnell wie das Netz und so verlässlich wie eine renommierte Zeitung.




Zusätzlich zur Website betreuen wir alle mobilen Angebote und Apps des Hauses, das umfangreiche digitale Pay-Angebot sowie die Zeitungsapp, die täglich eine digitale Version der Zeitung bietet. Mit Podcasts, Newslettern und Chatbots landen die wichtigsten Themen in Echtzeit auf dem eigenen Device.




Worin Du Dich Verwirklichen Kannst




 * Du sorgst gemeinsam im Team für die adäquate Umsetzung der Produktanforderungen, übernimmst Entwicklungsaufgaben im Front- und Backend
 * Du legst großen Wert auf produktübergreifende Zusammenarbeit und Wissenstransfer
 * Es erwartet dich ein agiles und interdisziplinäres Team aus Scrum Master, Product Owner, Tester, Web-Analyst, Visual Designer und Entwicklern




Was Wir Uns Von Dir Wünschen




 * Du bist motiviert im Team zu arbeiten und bringst trotzdem eigene Ideen ein
 * Du willst dazulernen und Dich ständig verbessern
 * Du bist Entwickler:in mit Berufserfahrung in der Web-Entwicklung
 * Du solltest mit der Arbeit in einem agilen Team (Scrum, Kanban, o.ä.) vertraut sein




Wie Wir Arbeiten




 * Wir arbeiten im Team als Fullstack-Entwickler – oft im Pairing – und möchten auch eine geteilte Verantwortung für unsere Arbeit. Es gibt keine Code-Ownership und prinzipiell sollte jede:r jedes Problem lösen können.
 * Wir entwickeln mit macOS oder Linux – Du hast die Wahl.
 * Wir arbeiten nutzerorientiert. Daher legen wir großen Wert auf Feedback unserer Leser:innen und Erkenntnisse aus datengetriebenen Experimenten.
 * Im Rahmen von Pairing, Pull-Requests, Technik-Vorträgen und Workshops verteilen wir Wissen im Team und im Unternehmen.




Wir entwickeln und betreiben das Webangebot der Süddeutschen Zeitung als Microservices basierend auf dem folgenden Stack:




 * Entwicklung: Node.js, TypeScript, React, Next.js, CSS-in-JS (Emotion)
 * Testing: Jest, Cypress, Percy, Speedcurve
 * Tooling: CI/CD, GitHub, Terraform, npm, Webpack
 * Plattform: Kubernetes, Docker, Varnish
 * AWS: Cloudfront, Lambda, EKS, S3, SNS, Cognito
 * Datastorage: Elasticsearch, DynamoDB
 * Logging/Monitoring: Datadog




Unser Angebot




 * Starte mit einem strukturierten Onboarding: Lerne unser Medienhaus sowie unseren CEO kennen und komme bei unseren Networking-Events mit neuen und erfahrenen Kolleg:innen in Kontakt
 * Erhalte das volle Paket: Arbeite hybrid, spare mit unserer betrieblichen Altersvorsorge für später und genieße 30 Urlaubstage sowie attraktive Rabatte und vergünstigte Abos für Mitarbeitende
 * Gestalte Deinen Entwicklungsweg individuell: Die hausinterne SWMH-Akademie hat einiges im Angebot von Trainings über Coaching bis hin zu mehrmonatigen Entwicklungsprogrammen
 * Bleibe geistig und körperlich fit: Deine Gesundheit liegt uns am Herzen. Deshalb bieten wir Dir eine ganzheitliche Gesundheitsförderung an, welche unter anderem Vorsorgeuntersuchungen sowie verschiedene Impulse zum Thema Gesundheit beinhalten
 * Bringe Dich ein: Wir geben Themen rund um Diversity und Inklusion Raum und bieten unseren Mitarbeitenden Fokus- und Netzwerkgruppen an, um sich einzubringen
 * Hilf mit: Wir nutzen unsere Reichweite für den guten Zweck und unterstützen regionale Hilfsorganisationen. Mehr Infos dazu hier




Überzeugt?




Mehr zum Bewerbungsprozess hier. Jetzt online in nur 5 Minuten bewerben! Wir freuen uns über aussagekräftige Bewerbungen inklusive CV, Anschreiben und Zeugnissen.

title: Backend Developer, Python (m/f/d)
description:
Who is Preisenergie?




Preisenergie develops pricing software for energy vendors. We help our customers calculate fair prices for a fully renewable and digital energy system. We model energy prices, simulate millions of alternative prices and choose optimal ones that best fit the goals of our customers (not always profit!). Our prices recover costs of individual consumers' energy consumptions and keep margins low enough to be competitive.




We are a team of 10, with 3 CDTM, and we like to celebrate with cake rather than with champagne.




What does the tech stack look like?




On the backend side we have Fast APIs and pandas/polars. Our database of choice is PostgreSQL. In the frontend we are using Typescript and React.




What will I be working on?




You will have the chance to work on a multitude of greenfield or recently started applications. The applications are backend heavy. The combination of statistics, optimization and financial modeling means that an average request in our backend involves computations on around 25 million rows. Designing an API around to handle these types of requests will be your daily job. Taking care of response speed and memory usage is important.




About You




We don’t want you to be a rock star, a ninja, or a superhero, but to have solid experience with web technologies and software architecture in a professional context and with working and communicating with teams. We are looking for someone who makes well-founded, pragmatic decisions about what competencies to develop and what technologies to use.




 * Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in computer science, IT, or equivalent experience
 * Working knowledge of Fast API framework
 * Knowledge of any of the major cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.)
 * Interest in doing data science code with pandas
 * Interest in becoming a team lead over time
 * Understanding of Docker and containerization technologies like Kubernetes is a plus
 * Exposure to frontend programming and R/shiny is a plus
   




Why should I join your team?




 * Make energy consumption more sustainable
 * Nerd out over optimization algorithms, bayesian statistics & co.
 * Get your hands dirty on BIG data (energy consumptions, market prices)
 * Use the opportunity to work from home for 3/5 days per week
 * Enjoy fair compensation: 60-80k salary (depending on experience), 1.5k training budget, Deutschlandticket
 * Grow a company together with an experienced team (MIT, HEC, CDTM, Simon-Kucher) and a proven business model
 * Enjoy downtown office (right next to subway station Münchner Freiheit), including fresh fruit, yoghourt and self-made espresso

title: Frontend Developer (w/m/d)
description:
WEN WIR SUCHEN




Dein Code haucht unseren Ideen Leben ein. Du bringst Pixel zum Tanzen und User zum Ziel. Deine Problemlöselust haut selbst den stärksten Bug um.




Und Entscheidungen? Triffst du schnell und selbstbewusst. Umringt von einem Team aus Spezialisten fährt du zur Höchstleistung auf – und du stehst extrem auf Clean Codes und den neuesten Tech-Stack.




Erkennst du dich wieder? Dann arbeite mit uns als Frontend Developer (w/m/d) an Websites und Web-Apps, die Menschen begeistern. Im Team. In München, Valencia oder Remote.




DEINE AUFGABEN




 * Du setzt anspruchsvolle User Interfaces um – für Websites und Web-Anwendungen unserer nationalen und internationalen Kunden.
 * Frontend-Standards und kreative Problemlösung mit neuen Technologien? Kannst du beides.
 * Du bist die Schnittstelle zwischen Design, Entwicklung und Kunde. Und liebst Teamwork, Feedback und Erfahrungsaustausch.
 * Deine Code Reviews sind systematisch, gründlich und bringen unser Entwicklungsteam und unsere Kunden nach vorne. Qualität rules!




DEINE UNSCHLAGBAREN FÄHIGKEITEN
 * Du schreibst saubere, performante, nachhaltige Codes.
 * Hinterfragen, beraten, Verantwortung übernehmen: Das ist dein Ding.
 * Web-Entwicklung mit neuen Tools und Technologien bringt dich zum Strahlen.
 * Dein Gespür für UI/UX-Design ist treffsicher, dein Auge für Animationen überzeugt.
 * Du bringst folgenden Technologie-Stack mit:
    * Sehr gute Kenntnisse in JavaScript und ES6.
    * Sehr gute Kenntnisse in CSS3, Sass und PostCSS.
    * Sehr gute Kenntnisse in HTML5.
    * Erfahrung mit mindestens einem dieser Frameworks: React, Angular,Vue.js.
    * Wenn möglich Erfahrung mit Tailwind CSS.
    * Sehr gute Kenntnisse mit git und Gitflow.
    * Keine Scheu vor CMS-Anbindung: TYPO3 / Statamic / Wordpress.
    * Erfahrung mit Build-Automatisierung (node.js, gulp, webpack) und Deployment
    * Verständnis von IT-Sicherheit (OWASP)
    * Routinierter Umgang mit Design Systems und einem modularem Aufbau von Frontends (Photoshop/Figma zu Code)
    * Gefühl für Perfomanz und Usability Na, Lust direkt mit uns loszulegen?




DEINE VORTEILE BEI COMA




 * Arbeite in unserem internationalen Team in München und Valencia.
 * Genieße flache Strukturen, viel Freiraum und eine familiäre Arbeitsatmosphäre.
 * Work-Life-Party: Freu dich auf flexible Arbeitszeiten statt ständiger Überstunden.
 * Homeoffice ist bei uns normal, Büro auch. Hol einfach das Beste für dich raus.
 * Arbeite, wo andere Urlaub machen – zum Beispiel in unserem Office in Valencia.
 * Was willst du beruflich und persönlich erreichen? Wir unterstützen dich mit Weiterbildungsangeboten, Altersvorsorge und Entwicklungsgesprächen.
 * Windows oder macOS: Wähle die Hardware, die zu dir passt.
 * Team-Lunch am Dienstag, frisches Obst, Kaffee und liebe Worte – sind bei uns gratis.

title: Fullstack Software Developer (m/f/d)
description:
Company Description




Here at Volocopter, we are the pioneers of electric air taxis (electric vertical takeoff and landing aircraft - eVTOLs). We have pledged to bring urban air mobility to life by getting electric air taxis and other eVTOLs off the ground in a way that complements existing transportation options in megacities across the globe. Our aim is to offer affordable, on-demand air taxi services that fly people to their destination quickly and safely. In 2011 we carried out the first-ever piloted flight of a fully electric multicopter and have since conducted more than 1,500 public and private test flights across the world (www.volocopter.com).




Job Description




Your crew during this flight:




As Fullstack Software Developer at Volocopter, you will be part of the CDO Resort. You work together with our product owners, partners, and UI/UX experts on high-quality software solutions in cross functional, autonomous teams. Your team builds the Aircraft Analytics software for VoloIQ, bringing together data from multiple sources, and combine it together into a product that makes the data tangible and is loved by your customer.




Your mission during this flight:




 * You will design and build advanced applications for the VoloIQ in one of the Product Teams
 * You will collaborate with the other developers in your cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
 * You will write tests on multiple layers for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
 * You will work on bug fixing and improving application stability & performance
 * You will support the entire application lifecycle (concept, design, test, release and support)
 * You will stay up-to-date with new technology trends




Want to know more? Check out our Developer Blog.




Qualifications




Check in your professional skills:




 * You have a degree in computer science or a comparable education
 * Proven working experience in software development in Python, Kotlin or TypeScript
 * Experience with third-party libraries and APIs like FastAPI, Spring Boot or React
 * Solid understanding of OOP and FP paradigms, and you know when to use which
 * Working knowledge of the general cloud landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
 * Solid understanding of the full development life cycle
 * Domain knowledge of flight testing or other aviation-related fields such as aircraft operations or aerospace engineering desireable




Additional Information




Our Volocopter flight includes:




 * Fast-growing high-tech company with a superb network of investors and partners 
 * Chance to shape the future of aviation
 * Help us to create groundbreaking new projects - from scratch! 
 * Personal accountability, as well as growth and learning opportunities, based on your personal strengths
 * An inspiring workplace with modern workspaces, flexible hours, quick decision-making, a flat hierarchy, positive leadership, great team spirit
 * Attractive compensation package




Diversity at Volocopter:




Our differences make us stronger. At Volocopter, we value equal opportunities, trust, and ensure all employees feel heard. As change-makers in air mobility, we believe that changing the world starts with each of us. We are committed to driving innovation by celebrating diversity and fostering an inclusive culture where everyone is treated equally and respectfully, regardless of our different backgrounds and roles in the company.

title: FullStack Developer
description:
Your mission




We are seeking a highly skilled Full Stack Developer who will play a crucial role in our development team. As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for a diverse set of tasks, focusing on DevOps, front-end development, and back-end development. This position requires a strong understanding of the entire software development life cycle and the ability to work across various technologies and platforms.




DevOps :




 * Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines for efficient and automated software delivery.
 * Configure and manage deployment infrastructure, including cloud services, servers, and databases.
 * Monitor and troubleshoot production systems, ensuring high availability, performance, and security.
 * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement DevOps best practices and standards.
   




Front-end Development :




 * Develop user-facing features using modern web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.
 * Create responsive and intuitive user interfaces that deliver an exceptional user experience.
 * Collaborate with UX/UI designers to translate design concepts into functional code.
 * Optimize front-end performance and ensure compatibility across different browsers and devices.
   




Back-end Development :




 * Design and develop server-side applications and APIs using programming languages like Java, Kotlin, or Go.
 * Implement and maintain databases, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval.
 * Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate the front-end and back-end components.
 * Write well-structured, scalable, and maintainable code following industry best practices.
   




Note: The percentage breakdown of responsibilities may vary depending on the specific needs and priorities of the organization and your desired focus. The percentages provided in this job description are meant to give a general idea of the role's distribution of responsibilities.




Your profile




 * Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
 * Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer, focusing on DevOps, front-end, and back-end development.
 * Strong knowledge of DevOps tools and practices, including CI/CD, configuration management, and containerization.
 * Proficiency in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js).
 * Solid understanding of back-end development, including server-side languages (e.g., Java, Kotlin, Go) and databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
 * Experience working with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and infrastructure-as-code tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation).
 * Familiarity with agile development methodologies and version control systems (e.g., Git).
 * Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently and as part of a team.
 * Strong communication and collaboration skills.
   




Why us?




We not only offer you a job, but you are cordially invited to become part of a strong corporate culture and to help shape it in the long term. Our team is our greatest asset, so it is most important to us that you fit into our team. Your mindset is what counts for us.




We don't teach you any values, such as "be innovative" or "integer". Instead, we are counting on you doing the right thing, being able to see challenges from a different perspective and wanting to question the existing and change the status quo, because that is in our DNA.




NIMMSTA develops cloud services and software products for the NIMMSTA HS 50 product family. The software development department is responsible for the development, operation and maintenance of all software products and services. It is characterized by strong collaboration and open communication to achieve a common goal. We use agile procedures and use modern tools to make processes efficient.




About Us




The NIMMSTA INDUSTRIAL SMART WATCH brings efficiency to all processes in retail, the automotive industry, production, logistics, intralogistics and Q-commerce.




Try it out without obligation.

title: Backend Software Engineer  (m/f/d)

Your primary focus will be on building scalable, reliable and efficient backend systems to support our robotics ecosystem. In this role, you will be able to:

Hi there, happy to meet you!

idealworks was founded in 2020 as a wholly owned BMW Group subsidiary. As a deep-tech company, we offer an industry-leading solution portfolio for the autonomization of the modern factory with our robotics ecosystem consisting of our cloud platform AnyFleet and our autonomous mobile robot iw.hub.

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer (w/d/m)
description:
About Ory




With more than 30,000 members, Ory is the leading open-source identity management, authentication and authorization ecosystem and community in the world. Ory’s flagship zero trust network “Ory Network” is a global, scalable and secure platform for managing identities and its distribution across various internet services including IoT and emerging Fintech systems.  * Experience architecting and developing solutions to ambiguous problems.
 * Experience working with Kubernetes and other Cloud IaaS, PaaS, or SaaS products.
 * Interest in the latest web standards and technologies.
 * Commitment to work an average of 4 days a week in the office in Munich
   




Mindset
